an3.41:1.1: “Tinnam, bhikkhave, sammukhibhava saddho kulaputto bahum punnam pasavati.
an3.41:1.3: Saddhaya, bhikkhave, sammukhibhava saddho kulaputto bahum punnam pasavati.
an3.41:1.4: Deyyadhammassa, bhikkhave, sammukhibhava saddho kulaputto bahum punnam pasavati.
an3.41:1.5: Dakkhineyyanam, bhikkhave, sammukhibhava saddho kulaputto bahum punnam pasavati.
an3.41:1.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam sammukhibhava saddho kulaputto bahum punnam pasavati”ti.
